title: Racist Walgreens Myth, Michael Myers = BLM Ally? 10.21.21
itunes:title: Racist Walgreens Myth, Michael Myers = BLM Ally? 10.21.21
description:
In episode 1013, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and writer Kenny DeForest to discuss Racist myth or real life? Walgreens edition, RUDY IS NOT DRUNK Vol. 912, Facebook’s Brand Is So Toxic Zuckerberg Reportedly Wants to Change Its Name, The Awkward Politics of the New Halloween Movies  and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Racist myth or real life? Walgreens edition
  2. RUDY IS NOT DRUNK Vol. 912
  3. Facebook’s Brand Is So Toxic Zuckerberg Reportedly Wants to Change Its Name
  4. The Awkward Politics of the New Halloween Movies
  5. LISTEN: DJ Nu-Mark, Bacao Rhythm & Steel Band - Everybody Everybody


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
